name: Blank hallways
description:
Made for the May Day 1.0 game jam
All hallways are procedurally generated, with procedurally generated props and randomly placed keys and enemies, made in 2 days in UE4 

IF STUCK PAUSE GAME(esc or P) AND CLICK RESTART

Maze generation is a bit jank and might break

All coding, modeling and animations by dabt0402
Player breathing sounds by Paderunt

WASD to move
Mouse to look around

Kill or freeze spiders in place by pointing your light at it

Get a key and return to the door
